resources.string: "This is a short guide to help you navigate through the app. Press next to continue or skip to enter.
Press SERVER to connect to the server. This is required to perform any actions with the loudspeakers and/or equalization.
Lists all loudspeaker devices in current network. Press one to enter settings.
Provides a map of all nearby loudspeakers represented with dots.
This contains all equalization options as well as graphs with current EQ settings.
